00032 Parameterization ParameterizationAlpha = {
00033   name : "Alpha",
00034   Pararead : Alpharead,
00035   Parawrite : Alphawrite,
00036   Paraclone : Alphaclone,

00043 // number of real parameter of a Gaussian
00044 #define NGAUSS 7                
00045 
00046 
00047 void Alphaclone(const Para* q, Para* qp)
00048 {
00049   int i;
00050 
00051   strcpy(qp->name, q->name);
00052   qp->A = q->A; qp->Z = q->Z; qp->N = q->N;
00053   qp->n = q->n;
00054 
00055   qp->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00056   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00057     qp->x[i] = q->x[i];
00058 
00059   qp->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00060 }

00063 #define BUFSIZE 255
00064 
00065 int Alpharead(FILE* fp, Para* q)
00066 {
00067   char buf[BUFSIZE];
00068   int i;
00069 
00070   do
00071     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00072   while (strncmp(buf, "<Para ", 5) && !feof(fp));
00073   if (feof(fp)) {
00074     fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Para ...>\n");
00075     return -1;
00076   }
00077   
00078   char Pname[80], qname[80];
00079 
00080   sscanf(buf, "<Para %s %s>", Pname, qname);
00081   if (strcmp(Pname, "Alpha")) {
00082     fprintf(stderr, "not a Alpha parameter set\n");
00083     return -1;
00084   }
00085   strcpy(q->name, stripstr(qname, ">"));
00086 
00087   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00088   if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d %d", &q->A, &q->Z, &q->N) != 3) {
00089     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00090     return -1;
00091   }
00092   if (q->A != 2*q->Z || q->A != 2*q->N) {
00093     fprintf(stderr, "not an alpha nucleus in line\n>>%s<<\n",
00094             stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00095     return -1;
00096   }
00097   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00098   if (sscanf(buf, "%d", &q->ngauss) != 1) {
00099     fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
00100     return -1;
00101   }
00102 
00103   q->n = q->A/4*NGAUSS;
00104 
00105   q->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
00106 
00107   double a, b0re, b0im, b1re, b1im, b2re, b2im; 
00108   for (i=0; i<q->A/4; i++) {
00109     fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00110     if (sscanf(buf, "%lf (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf)", 
00111                &a, &b0re, &b0im, &b1re, &b1im, &b2re, &b2im) != 7) {
00112       fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
00113               stripstr(buf,"\n"));
00114       return -1;
00115     }
00116     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = a;
00117     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = b0re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = b0im;
00118     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = b1re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = b1im;
00119     q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = b2re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6] = b2im;
00120   }     
00121 
00122   fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
00123   if (strncmp(buf, "</Para>", 7)) {
00124     fprintf(stderr, "didn't find </Para>\n");
00125     return -1;
00126   }     
00127 
00128   return 0;
00129 }

00131 
00132 int Alphawrite(FILE* fp, const Para* q)
00133 {
00134   int i;
00135 
00136   fprintf(fp, "<Para Alpha %s>\n", q->name);
00137   fprintf(fp, "%d %d %d\n", q->A, q->Z, q->N);
00138   fprintf(fp, "%d\n", q->ngauss);
00139   for (i=0; i<q->A/4; i++)
00140     fprintf(fp,
00141             "%12.8f  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)\n",
00142             q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0],
00143             q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2],
00144             q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4],
00145             q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 6]);
00146   fprintf(fp, "</Para>\n");
00147 
00148   return 0;
00149 }

00152 void AlphainitSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00153 {
00154   int k;
00155 
00156   Q->A = q->A; Q->Z = q->Z; Q->N = q->N;
00157   Q->ngauss = q->ngauss;
00158 
00159   Q->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00160   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00161     Q->idx[k] = k;
00162     
00163   Q->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
00164   for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
00165     Q->ng[k] = 1;
00166 
00167   Q->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian));
00168   for (k=0; k<q->A/4; k++) {
00169     Q->G[4*k+0].xi = 1; 
00170     Q->G[4*k+1].xi = 1; 
00171     Q->G[4*k+2].xi = -1; 
00172     Q->G[4*k+3].xi = -1; 
00173   }
00174 }
00175 
00176 
00177 void AlphatoSlaterDet(const Para* q, SlaterDet* Q)
00178 {
00179   int k, ki;
00180 
00181   for (k=0; k<q->A/4; k++)
00182     for (ki=0; ki<4; ki++) {
00183     Q->G[4*k+ki].chi[0] = ki % 2 ? 1 : 0;
00184     Q->G[4*k+ki].chi[1] = ki % 2 ? 0 : 1;
00185     Q->G[4*k+ki].a      = q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 0];
00186     Q->G[4*k+ki].b[0]   = q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 1] + I* q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 2];
00187     Q->G[4*k+ki].b[1]   = q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 3] + I* q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 4];
00188     Q->G[4*k+ki].b[2]   = q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 5] + I* q->x[k*NGAUSS+ 6];
00189   }
00190 }
00191 
00192 
00193 void AlphaprojectgradSlaterDet(const Para* q,
00194                              const gradSlaterDet* dQ, double* dq)
00195 {
00196   int k, ki, i;
00197 
00198   // only converting a complex in a real gradient
00199 
00200   for (k=0; k<q->A/4; k++) {
00201     for (i=0; i<NGAUSS; i++)
00202       dq[k*NGAUSS+ i] = 0.0;
00203     for (ki=0; ki<4; ki++) {
00204       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 0] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].a);
00205       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 1] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].b[0]);
00206       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 2] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].b[0]);
00207       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 3] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].b[1]);
00208       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 4] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].b[1]);
00209       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 5] += 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].b[2]);
00210       dq[k*NGAUSS+ 6] += 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[4*k+ki].b[2]);
00211     }
00212   }
00213 }
